sentences: They were from Fort Wayne, Indiana.
The band begun making music and performing locally in 2003.
After signing a record deal with Blood and Ink Records in 2007, several nationwide tours and two studio albums, the group officially disbanded in 2009.
They started as a band in 2003 and disbanded in 2009.
On April 14, 2012 the band reunited one last time to play the Stand Together Fest in Nashville, TN
